DOC.brief_summary: Study of a medication for the treatment of Schizophrenia in patients who are already taking Abilify, Risperdal, Seroquel, Zyprexa
DOC.brief_title: A Combination of Two Currently Approved Drugs to Enhance the Treatment of Schizophrenia
DOC.criteria: Must have a clinical diagnosis of Schizophrenia Must be at least 18 years of age and not older than 55 years of age Must have been stable on a dose of Abilify, Risperdal, Seroquel, or Zyprexa for the past 8 weeks Women of childbearing potential must be using a medically accepted means of contraception Must be able to swallow capsules Has serious health problems other than Schizophrenia Takes an antidepressant for depression Takes insulin for diabetes Have a history of alcohol or drug dependence (except for nicotine and caffeine) within the past 6 months
